so_53188059: for z in /path/to/archives/*.zip ; do
    while IFS= read -r f ;  do
        if unzip -p "$z" "$f" | grep -q "$string" ; then
            unzip "$z" "$f"
        fi
    done < <(unzip -Z1 "$z" '*.xml')
done
